svg.title: Titles and Descriptions
svg.desc: An example of how the contents of the 'title' and 'desc' elements may be presented in a user agent.

polygon.title: Beehive cell
polygon.desc: A simple hexagon with a yellow outline and no fill.

a.xlink:title: Beekeeper's Hive: an apiary resource
a.title: Link to Beekeeper's Hive: an apiary resource

use.title: Queen's Cell
use.desc: A hexagonal beehive cell. A purple hexagon in the middle of 6 other empty hexagons, symbolizing that it's filled with royal jelly.
